sentences.sentence: Forcing a child to behave morally may prevent her from internalizing the lesson you're trying to impart.
sentences.translation: 强迫孩子按道德行事可能会妨碍她将你试图传授的教训内化。

sentences.sentence: And it starts with internalizing heroic imagination, namely - I could do it.
sentences.translation: 这些来自内化在心底的英雄情结，即——我能办到！

sentences.sentence: Internalizing praise can lower your motivation to work hard just as much as criticism.
sentences.translation: 内部消化别人对你的表扬能降低你的动机促使你努力工作就好像受到的是批评一样。
